message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's in excellent condition and I know you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $16,000, which is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can find a compromise here.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $14,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
